text: Gurūhe az ʙuzurgoni qavmaş, ki kofir ʙudand va didori oxiratro durūƣ meşumurdand va onhoro dar zindagonii dunjo nozu ne'mat doda ʙudem, guftand: «In marde, ki şumoro ʙa jaktoparastī da'vat menamojad, insonest monandi şumo, az on cizhoe ki mexūred, mexūrad va az on cizhoe, ki meoşomed, meoşomad
